name: PGP Private Keyring
summary: An SKR file is a private keyring created by PGP Desktop Home, data encryption software used to secure a user's confidential digital information. It contains ASCII private keys used for decrypting PGP (Pretty Good Privacy) encrypted files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: PGP Desktop Home or other compatible PGP application

macos.display_name: PGP Desktop Home or other compatible PGP application
